name: I don't like u(nity)
description:
A very very broken game that features randomly generated levels and 1v1 style platforming pvp matches!

Matches end when another player has been knocked into the abyss below!

Controls

Move Up/Jump: (Player 1) - W, (Player 2) - Up Arrow

Move Left: (Player 1) - A, (Player 2) - Left Arrow

Move Right: (Player 1) - D, (Player 2) - Right Arrow

Move Down/Place Bomb: (Player 1) - S, (Player 2) - Down Arrow
